nodes.text: The zZip Motor Concepts Gladiator walker was a personal bipedal walker vehicle used in gladiatorial combat.

Designed from the All Terrain Scout Transport and All Terrain Personal Transport blueprints, each walker boasted shields and a light blaster cannon. The SecuriTech made a similar design. They were equipped with an emergency shut down system, which would cut power if an occupant was in danger of being injured.
